UserProfile.title: User Profile
UserProfile.description: Represents a user's public and private profile information.

id.description: The user's unique ID, matching their Auth UID.

photoURL.description: URL for the user's profile picture.

Account.title: Account
Account.description: Represents a user's financial account (e.g., bank account, credit card).

userId.description: The UID of the user who owns this account.

type.description: The type of the financial account.

balance.description: The current balance of the account.

bankName.description: The name of the financial institution.

userId.description: The UID of the user who owns this transaction.

accountId.description: The ID of the account this transaction belongs to.

description.description: A brief description of the transaction.

amount.description: The monetary value of the transaction.

category.description: The category assigned to the transaction.

date.description: The date and time the transaction occurred.

Category.title: Category
Category.description: Represents a user-defined category for transactions.

userId.description: The UID of the user who owns this category.

Budget.title: Budget
Budget.description: Represents a user-defined budget for a category.

userId.description: The UID of the user who owns this budget.

category.description: The transaction category this budget applies to.

amount.description: The total budgeted amount for the period.

spent.description: The amount spent in this category for the period.

userId.description: The UID of the user who owns this goal.

name.description: The name of the goal (e.g., 'Vacation Fund').

targetAmount.description: The target amount to save for the goal.

currentAmount.description: The current amount saved towards the goal.

savingStrategy.description: The periodic saving strategy for the goal.

periodicContribution.description: The calculated amount to be saved per period based on the strategy.

Notification.title: Notification
Notification.description: Represents a notification for a user.

userId.description: The UID of the user this notification is for.

message.description: The content of the notification message.

isRead.description: Whether the user has read the notification.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the notification was created.

'/users/{userId}'.description: Stores public and private information for a user.

'/users/{userId}/accounts/{accountId}'.description: Stores financial accounts for a specific user.

'/users/{userId}/transactions/{transacti.description: Stores all transactions for a specific user.

'/users/{userId}/budgets/{budgetId}'.description: Stores custom spending budgets for a specific user.

'/users/{userId}/goals/{goalId}'.description: Stores financial goals for a specific user.

'/users/{userId}/notifications/{notifica.description: Stores notifications for a specific user.
